name: Rescue Mission (Toreole)
description:
Evacuate the research station, and prevent the enemy from getting their hands on your precious researchers! You must be quick, and avoid the deadly defense mechanisms.

There are 5 levels in this game, each adding more things to deal with! This results in a rough estimated playtime of between 5 and 10 minutes.

This game is an entry for the Brackeys GameJam (2022). Theme: "You are not alone".

How to play

W/A/S/D or arrow keys for movement
Mouse cursor for aiming
Left click to shoot
Walk into items to activate or collect them
